title: Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: United States of America
additional-notes: Some free online issues of this series can be found linked from the 'Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum' record, covering the overall series for which this is a subseries

The first renewal mentioned here is the first with a CCE renewal record specifically mentioning this serial. It was filed under Books, not Periodicals.  This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
